worldName: The secret behind a haunted painting
Instroduction: You are now detective ALaric, who's meant to solve the truth behind Chais death.

locations.name: Town
locations.theory: The town is in Southest Asia, where people talk about Chais death.

NPC.name: villager
dialogue: Chai have bought a diabolical painting from a shaman, then he died 3 days later.
His house is nearby, maybe you can find something that could help you.

locations.name: Chai House
locations.theory: Mysterious house, full of aged items.

locations.name: Office
locations.theory: Office test centre, At this location you need to find 3 blood samples.

items.name: Old Case File
items.description: Agus died 3 day after purchasing the same painting.

items.name: Ritual Notes
items.description: Ritual demands blood from 3 different people with pure yin date.

locations.name: Seram Island
locations.theory: Seram Island. You need to collect rooster blood and cinnabar.

loot.name: Rooster Blood
loot.description: Rooster Blood use for ritual and needed situation.

items.name: Cinnabar
items.description: Cinnabar desperate material for swrod and ritual.

locations.name: Laboratory
locations.theory: Laboratory. Blood must be fresh within 24h (≤ 24h). You need to compile 3 different blood samples.

locations.name: Abandon Temple
locations.theory: Abandon temple. The ritual will be accomplish here. Therefore you need to take care of a haunted soul

NPC.name: adam
dialogue: I am Adam, I am meant to search for useful information during that you will start the ritual.
Till you got all you need enter (ritual).

locations.name: Painting Room
locations.theory: Jsi uvnitř malby. Musíš přežít 3 dny a dodržovat pravidla.

items.name: Rule List
items.description: Rule: You need to use command (rest) every day. Otherwise -15 points.

rules.text: You need to use command REST every single day.

locations.name: Forge
locations.theory: Forge. Craft a sword: cinnabar + roosters blood + bronze.

locations.name: Wedding
locations.theory: Wedding. First of all you need to kill shaman, then kill the rooster between 19:00-21:00
